    (function (window, document) {
      var regexApp = function () {
        return /MobApp_Android|MobApp_iOS|MobApp_WP/;
      };

      var getUserAgent = function () {
        if (window.getUserAgent) {
          return window.getUserAgent();
        }
        return window.navigator.userAgent;
      };

      var extractAppFromUserAgent = function () {
        var appUserAgent, appVars, index, ua, userAgentParts;
        ua = getUserAgent();
        userAgentParts = ua.split(' ');
        for (index in userAgentParts) {
          appUserAgent = userAgentParts[index];
          if (regexApp().test(appUserAgent)) {
            appVars = appUserAgent.split('/');
            return {
              name: appVars[0].replace('_', ' '),
              version: appVars[1],
              frameworkVersion: appVars[2]
            };
          }
        }
        return null;
      };

      var addGlbOnAppClass = function () {
        var frameworkVersion, nativeAppInfo;
        nativeAppInfo = extractAppFromUserAgent();
        if (nativeAppInfo !== null) {
          if (nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion) {
            frameworkVersion = parseInt(nativeAppInfo.frameworkVersion, 10);
            if (frameworkVersion >= 1) {
              document.documentElement.className += ' glb-on-app';
            }
          }
        }
      };

      addGlbOnAppClass(); // Garante que o header irá sumir rápido
    })(window, document);
  </script><header id="header-produto" class="header-navegacao header-home header-navegacao-ge" data-analytics="T"><div id="glbbarrawidget"></div><div class="floating-bar"><div class="header-bar"><div class="grid-12 clearfix area-principal row"><div class="column"><div class="menu-area to-left" data-analytics="S"><div class="menu-button"><div class="burger"><b></b><b></b><b></b></div><span class="menu-label">MENU</span></div><span class="menu-produto"></span></div><a class="logo-area" href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/combate/"><h1 class="logo icon-produto">combate</h1></a><div class="to-right"><div class="search-area"><form id="frmBuscaScroll" action="#"><input id="search-input-floating" type="text" name="q" placeholder="BUSCAR" class="search" /><label for="search-input-floating" class="glass-container"><div class="glass"><div class="iglass css3pie"></div></div></label></form></div></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cube-container"><div class="cube"><div class="face front"><div class="grid-12 clearfix area-principal row"><div class="column"><div class="menu-area to-left" data-analytics="S"><div class="menu-button"><div class="burger"><b></b><b></b><b></b></div><span class="menu-label">MENU</span></div><span class="menu-produto"></span></div><a class="logo-area" href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/combate/"><h1 class="logo icon-produto">combate</h1></a><div class="to-right"><div class="search-area"><form id="frmBuscaScroll" action="#"><input id="search-input-top" type="text" name="q" placeholder="BUSCAR" class="search" /><label for="search-input-top" class="glass-container"><div class="glass"><div class="iglass css3pie"></div></div></label></form></div><div id="busca-padrao"></div><div class="banner"><div class="opec-area opec-right"><div class="opec-internal"><div id="banner_insert" class="tag-manager-publicidade-container"></div><script>typeof OAS_AD != "undefined" && OAS_AD("Right")</script

    (function (window, document) {
      try {
        new CustomEvent("test");
      } catch (e) {
        var CustomEvent = function (event, params) {
          var evt;
          params = params || {
                bubbles: false,
                cancelable: false,
                detail: undefined
              };

          evt = document.createEvent("CustomEvent");
          evt.initCustomEvent(event, params.bubbles, params.cancelable, params.detail);
          return evt;
        };

        CustomEvent.prototype = window.Event.prototype;
        window.CustomEvent = CustomEvent; // expose definition to window
      }

      glb = window.glb || {};
      glb.headerReady = true;
      document.dispatchEvent(new CustomEvent('glb.headerDom.ready'));
    })(window, document);

        </h2>

        
    </div>

    <div class="card-eventos-do-combate-card-principal">
        <div class="card-eventos-do-combate-lutador">
            <img src="http://s2.glbimg.com/cb_JsdUosfOvYLbMg3rtsUxChk0=/125x100/top/smart/http://s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2017/03/22/cintiacarvillo-500.png"
                alt="Calvillo" width="125" height="100">
        </div>

        <div class="card-eventos-do-combate-lutador">

        </div>

        <h2 class="card-eventos-do-combate-lutador-titulo">
            <span>Calvillo</span>
            <small>vs</small>
            <span>Gonzalez</span>
        </h2>

        
    </div>

                <img src="http://s2.glbimg.com/oRQ_SDEqsVbtk2gnJt9N_0EUvGc=/125x100/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2016/08/17/img_0479.jpg" alt="Anthony Johnson defende retorno de Jon Jones em disputa de título no UFC">
            </figure>
        </a>

        <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/combate/noticia/2017/02/anthony-johnson-defende-retorno-de-jon-jones-em-disputa-de-titulo-no-ufc.html" title="Perto de encarar Daniel Cormier pelo cinturão da categoria dos pesos-meio-pesados do Ultimate, &quot;Rumble&quot; acredita que é justo &quot;Bones&quot; enfrentar o vencedor do confronto" class="gui-color-primary-link gui-feed-title"
            data-href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/combate/noticia/2017/02/anthony-johnson-defende-retorno-de-jon-jones-em-disputa-de-titulo-no-ufc.html" data-type="image" data-src="http://s2.glbimg.com/oRQ_SDEqsVbtk2gnJt9N_0EUvGc=/125x100/smart/s.glbimg.com/es/ge/f/original/2016/08/17/img_0479.jpg">
            <h3 class="gui-text-title">Anthony Johnson defende retorno de Jon Jones em disputa de título no UFC</h3>
        </a>
    </div>

    <div class="gui-feed-hgroup gui-newsfeed-item-wrapper gui-newsfeed-item-wrapper-with-thumb gui-image-hover">
        <a href="http://sportv.globo.com/site/combate/noticia/2017/02/dana-jon-jones-pegara-o-vencedor-de-cormier-x-johnson-pelo-cinturao.html" title="Presidente do UFC afirma que o &quot;timing&quot; para a volta do ex-campeão, em julho, é perfeito para que ele seja o próximo desafiante ao título dos meio-pesados do evento" class="gui-newsfeed-item-thumb"

            </figure>
        </a>

<script type="text/javascript">
  var cancelarRefresh;
  cancelarRefresh = function () {
  };
  
  var OT_DELAY = 180000;
  REFRESH_TIMEOUT = null;

  function iniciarRefresh() {
      REFRESH_TIMEOUT = setTimeout(function () {
          window.location.reload();
      }, OT_DELAY);
  }
  iniciarRefresh();
  cancelarRefresh = function () {
    clearTimeout(REFRESH_TIMEOUT);
    console && console.log && console.log("Refresh cancelado");
  };

  $(window).scroll(function(){
      cancelarRefresh();
      iniciarRefresh();
  });

  
</script>

<script>

	var menuOffset = 300;
	$(document).on("scroll", function(){
	       var docScroll = $(document).scrollTop();
	       if(docScroll >= menuOffset) { 
	           $("#floating-bar").addClass("fixed");
			   $("#floating-bar").slideDown(300);
	           //dynamically change the width of floating bar according to it's width of previous state 
	       }else {
			   $("#floating-bar").slideUp(300,function(){
				   $("#floating-bar").removeClass("fixed");
			   });
	       }
	});


</script>

				                       	<li><a href="/divers%C3%A3o/magazine">Magazine</a></li>

						</ul>
					</li>
					
				
			
		        
		            
	                
		
					<li class="single-menu-phone interessa inative">
					
						Interessa 
						
							<img alt="seta de navegação" src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/mobile/ico-arrow-down-phone.png" class="arrow-nav" >

<!-- 
	Div Flutuante Login:
 -->

<div class="hide">
	<div id="float-forgotten" class="inline-content poster twelve columns">
	
		<div class="blockUI blockOverlay"></div>	

		<div class="column box-bg">
			<form method="post" onsubmit="return false;" id="floatForgottenPasswordForm">
				<div class="twelve column top">
					<div class="six column title">
						Recuperar Senha
					</div>
					<div class="six column">
						<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/btn-email-close.png" alt="Fechar" title="Fechar" id="close-forgotten">	
					</div>
				</div>
				<h3 class="form-error form-login twelve"></h3>
				<div class="twelve column form-login">
					<div class="twelve column input">
						<p>Digite o Email de seu cadastro:</p>
						<input type="text" name="reset_loginname" id="input-name" />
					</div>

				</div>	
				<div class="twelve column form-more">
					<div class="six column input">
					</div>
					<div class="six column input">
						<input type="submit" id="bt-login" value="entrar" />
					</div>
				</div> 
				<input type="hidden" name="login_site" value="2.627"/>
			</form>
		</div>	
	</div>
</div>

<script>
	var validator;
	jQuery().ready(function() {
	 	var validation = {
		 	rules: {
		 		reset_loginname: {
	            	required: true,
	                email: true
	            }
		 	},
            messages:{
            	reset_loginname:{
                	required:"O campo email é obrigatório",
                    email:"O campo email precisa ser preenchido com um email válido"
            	}
            },
            submitHandler: function(form) {
            	$(form).find("#bt-login").attr("disabled",true);	
				sempre.login.resetPassword(form);
			}
		 }

	 	validator = jQuery("#floatForgottenPasswordForm").validate(validation);
	});
	
</script>
	
	




<!-- 
	Div Flutuante Login:
 -->

<div class="hide">
	<div id="float-login" class="inline-content poster twelve columns">
	
	<form id="floatLoginForm" onsubmit="return false;" method="post">
		<div class="blockUI blockOverlay"></div>	

		<div class="column box-bg">
			<div class="twelve column top">
				<div class="six column title">
					Entrar
				</div>
				<div class="six column">
					<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/btn-email-close.png" alt="Fechar" title="Fechar" class="close-login">	
				</div>
			</div>
			<h3 class="form-error form-login twelve"></h3>
			<div class="twelve column form-login">
				<div class="twelve column input">
					<p>Email
                    <span style="color: #fff">
    
                        6</span></p>
					<input type="text" name="login_loginname" id="input-name" />
				</div>
				<div class="twelve column input">
					<p>Senha</p>
					<input type="password" name="login_password" id="input-pass" />
				</div>
			</div>	
			<div class="twelve column form-more">
				<div class="six column input">
					<a href="#" class="open-forgotten">Esqueci minha senha</a> 
				</div>
				<div class="six column input">
					<a href="javascript:facebooklogin();" class="btn-fb" >
						<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-fb-login.jpg" alt="Logar com Facebook" title="Logar com Facebook" class="social-plugin bt-login-fb">	
					</a>
					<a href="javascript:twitterlogin();" class="btn-tw">
						<img src="/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-tw-login.jpg" alt="Logar com Twitter" title="Logar com Twitter" class="social-plugin bt-login-tw">	
					</a>
					<input type="submit" id="bt-login" value="entrar" />
				</div>
			</div> 
		</div>	
		<input type="hidden" name="login_site" value="2.627"/>
	</form>
	</div>
</div>

<script>
	var validator;
	jQuery().ready(function() {
	 	var validation = {
		 	rules: {
		 		login_loginname: {
	            	required: true,
	                email: true
	            },
	            login_password:{
	            	required:true
	            }
		 	},
            messages:{
            	login_loginname:{
                	required:"O campo email é obrigatório",
                    email:"O campo email precisa ser preenchido com um email válido"
            	},
            	 login_password:{
 	            	required:"O campo senha é obrigatório"
 	            }
            },
            submitHandler: function(form) {
            	$(form).find("#bt-login").attr("disabled",true);	
				sempre.login.login(form);
			}
		 }

	 	validator = jQuery("#floatLoginForm").validate(validation);
	});
	
</script>

    <div class="twelve columns writer" data-elemento="lista-colunistas">
      <div class="twelve columns top">

          <div class="twelve columns info">

    <div class="cf slot-item  ">
        






<div class="twelve columns top"><h5>Veja os filmes em cartaz</h5></div>
<div class="twelve columns busca-assunto" data-elemento="cinema-filtror">
    <div class="twelve columns info">
        <div class="twelve columns">
            <div class="row input">
                <div class="six columns align-left"">
                    <select id="PorFilme">
                        <option value="">-- Filmes --</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="six columns align-right">
                    <select id="PorGenero">
                        <option value="">-- Gêneros --</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row input">
                <div class="six columns align-left">
                    <select id="PorCinema">
                        <option value="">-- Cinemas --</option>
                    </select>
                </div>
                <div class="six columns align-right">
                    <input id="PalavraChave" placeholder="Palavra-chave" type="text" value="">
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="twelve columns buscar-filme">
                <button id="BuscaFilme" class="btn">Buscar</button>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    function abreFiltro() {
        var id = $(this).attr("id");
        var value = $(this).val();

        window.location.href = "/diversão/roteiros-culturais/cinema?" + id + "=" + value;
    }

    $("#BuscaFilme").click(function () {
        var valor = $("#PalavraChave").val();
        if (valor) {
            window.location.href = "/diversão/roteiros-culturais/cinema?busca=" + valor;
        }

        return false;
    });


    var $SELECTS = [$("#PorFilme"), $("#PorGenero"), $("#PorCinema")];

    var json = {"CinemaFiltros":{"PorFilme":{"Registro":[{"ID":"2864","Valor":"A Bela e a Fera"},{"ID":"2876","Valor":"A Grande Muralha"},{"ID":"2860","Valor":"Cinquenta Tons Mais Escuros"},{"ID":"2903","Valor":"Era o Hotel Cambridge"},{"ID":"2900","Valor":"Fragmentado"},{"ID":"2895","Valor":"Hiroshima, Meu Amor"},{"ID":"2890","Valor":"Insubstitu\u00edvel"},{"ID":"2875","Valor":"Internet - O Filme"},{"ID":"2888","Valor":"Kong: A Ilha da Caveira"},{"ID":"2865","Valor":"Lego Batman - O Filme"},{"ID":"2873","Valor":"Lion - Uma Jornada para Casa"},{"ID":"2878","Valor":"Logan"},{"ID":"2881","Valor":"Moonlight: Sob a Luz do Luar"},{"ID":"2897","Valor":"O Filho de Joseph"},{"ID":"2896","Valor":"Pedro Osmar, Pra Liberdade Que Se Conquista"},{"ID":"2902","Valor":"Power Rangers"},{"ID":"2901","Valor":"T2 Trainspotting"},{"ID":"2827","Valor":"Tinha que Ser Ele? (*)"}]},"PorGenero":{"Registro":[{"ID":"1","Valor":"A\u00e7\u00e3o"},{"ID":"2","Valor":"Anima\u00e7\u00e3o"},{"ID":"3","Valor":"Aventura"},{"ID":"4","Valor":"Com\u00e9dia"},{"ID":"19","Valor":"Com\u00e9dia Dram\u00e1tica"},{"ID":"6","Valor":"Document\u00e1rio"},{"ID":"7","Valor":"Drama"},{"ID":"16","Valor":"Drama \/ Romance"},{"ID":"20","Valor":"Fantasia"},{"ID":"13","Valor":"Suspense"}]},"PorCinema":{"Registro":[{"ID":"14","Valor":"Belas"},{"ID":"19","Valor":"Betim "},{"ID":"2","Valor":"BH Shopping (Cineplex)"},{"ID":"3","Valor":"Big"},{"ID":"681","Valor":"Boulevard"},{"ID":"299","Valor":"Cidade"},{"ID":"686","Valor":"Contagem"},{"ID":"10","Valor":"Del Rey"},{"ID":"11","Valor":"Diamond Mall (Cineplex)"},{"ID":"683","Valor":"Esta\u00e7\u00e3o BH"},{"ID":"13","Valor":"Ita\u00fa Power Shopping"},{"ID":"12","Valor":"Minas Shopping"},{"ID":"688","Valor":"Monte Carmo "},{"ID":"16","Valor":"Norte"},{"ID":"15","Valor":"Pampulha Mall"},{"ID":"18","Valor":"Paragem"},{"ID":"687","Valor":"Partage Shopping Betim"},{"ID":"8","Valor":"P\u00e1tio Savassi (Cinemark)"},{"ID":"21","Valor":"Ponteio"},{"ID":"20","Valor":"Via Shopping"}]}}};
    var cf = json.CinemaFiltros;

    for (var i in $SELECTS) {
        var $select = $SELECTS[i];
        $select.on("change", abreFiltro);
        var id = $select.attr("id");

        var dados = cf[id].Registro;

        for (var j in dados) {
            var item = dados[j];

            var $option = $("<option value='" + item.ID + "'>" + item.Valor + "</option>")

            $select.append($option);
        }
    }

    $("#PorFilme").val("");
    $("#PorGenero").val("");
    $("#PorCinema").val("");


</script>

    </div>

  max-width:none;
}

    <div class="cf slot-item  last">
        <style>  
body.hotsites #main .posted-comment .user-interaction a.like {
    background-image: url('/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-curti-capa.png');
    padding-left: 15px;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

body.hotsites #main .posted-comment .user-interaction a.dislike {
    background-image: url('/img/sempre-editora/ico/ico-naocurti-capa.png');
    padding-left: 15px;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
}
  #floating-bar .tabs dd a:hover{border:none !important}
  #header-phone .menu-phone{border:none !important}
  body.diversao #edicaododia.edicao-do-dia .botao-edicaododia{background-color:#F17700 !important; background-image:none;
  #tabela-pan .pais-medal .flag img{width:42px; height:42px;}  
    
</style>

<script>
          $(function(){

            if (false && window.Polopoly && Polopoly.preview && !$("body").hasClass('super-noticia')) {
              Polopoly.preview.initialize();
              Polopoly.preview.initPageManager();
              Polopoly.preview.toolbar.initialize(Polopoly.Localization.Toolbar);
           
              var loadDone = false;
              onLoadDone = function() {
                  if (loadDone) {
                      $("#prf-loadhide").fadeOut(250);
                  } else {
                      loadDone = true;
                  }
              };
              Polopoly.preview.toolbar.ready(onLoadDone);
              onLoadDone();
  
              Polopoly.ContextMenu.init();
            }
            
            $("#navigation #ATF_center_300x250").remove();
           
            
        });
</script>

    </div>
	

      
  
            
</div>
    </div>
</div>

<!-- PUSH -->






    <div id="float-push" style="display: none">
       <div class="row panel push stage hide-for-small">
           <div class="twelve columns">
               <div class="one columns" id="p-time"></div>
               <div class="eleven columns chamada">
                   <div>
                       <div class="two columns setas"></div>
                   </div>
                   <div class="eleven columns">
                       <ul id="efect-push"></ul>
                   </div>
                   <div class="fechar"><a href="#" onclick="closePush();return false;">X</a></div>
               </div>
           </div>
        </div>
     </div>      
    
    <script type="text/javascript">
    	sempre.push.init();
		function closePush(){
			$("#float-push").hide();
		}
    </script>
       
          

	

	<!-- ATF - fim -->

  $(function(){
  	$("#ATF_top_940x60 div").mouseout(function(){ $(this).css("clip","rect(0px 940px 60px 0px)") }); 
  });       
  
</script>
